Title: Prohibits the manufacture, distribution and sale of children's foam mats containing formamide
Summary: Prohibits the manufacture, distribution and sale of children's foam mats containing formamide.
LawCode: Add Art 37 Title 4 §§37-0401 - 37-0409, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the manufacture, distribution and sale of children's foam mats containing formamide
